article_title: Cibola basketball player, neighbor share more than last name
article_text:
Smith 1 Gail Smith (left) lost her husband in July of last year and her neighbor, T.J. Smith (right), has helped her in the aftermath of her husband’s death by helping do housework to running errands. Buy this photo

Smith 2 Gail Smith (left) and T.J. Smith (right) share a laugh together as they retell one of many stories they’ve experienced throughout the year.
